mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TB_WEB_MAIN_POPUP WHERE IS_SHOW = 1 OR IS_SHOW = 9

SELECT IDX_POPUP_IMG, SUBJECT, CONTENTS_TYPE, POPUP_URL, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, IS_SHOW, REG_DATE, IDX_ADMIN, LAST_UPD_DATE, IDX_FILE_INFO FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by #{order_field} DESC) AS row_num ,IDX_POPUP_IMG, SUBJECT, CONTENTS_TYPE, POPUP_URL, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, IS_SHOW, REG_DATE, IDX_ADMIN, LAST_UPD_DATE, IDX_FILE_INFO FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_WEB_MAIN_POPUP WHERE IS_SHOW = 1 OR IS_SHOW = 9 order by IDX_POPUP_IMG desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page_num}*#{amount} ) WHERE row_num > (#{page_num} -1)*#{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_HOMEPAGE_INFO( IDX_POPUP_IMG, SUBJECT, CONTENTS_TYPE, POPUP_URL, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, IS_SHOW, REG_DATE, IDX_ADMIN, LAST_UPD_DATE, IDX_FILE_INFO) VALUES (SEQ_WEB_MAIN_POPUP.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content_type}, #{popup_url}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{is_show}, SYSDATE, #{idx_admin}, SYSDATE, #{idx_file_info} )
